summary: Edit/update the existing website for KVR Hospital, Nandyal.
architectural_notes: Contact phone numbers should be updated to: 08514 220234 and 7207534210 (replace both previously listed numbers).
Ensure a full-site scan/update so the old contact number is not shown anywhere (including lower-page sections like Contact area/footer and any other components).
known_issues: Old contact number still appears somewhere on the page (reported in a lower/bottom contact section).

existing_features.title: Update the website to represent “KVR Hospital, Nandyal” with correct hospital identity and core contact details (address, phone numbers, email) and clear 24x7 emergency availability messaging.

Create a clear, responsive landing-page structure suitable for a hospital website, including at minimum: Hero section, About section, Specialties/Departments section, Contact section, and a Footer; ensure all user-facing text is in English.
Add prominent call-to-action interactions for calling the hospital and reaching emergency services, using tel: links for the listed phone numbers and a mailto: link for the email address.

Establish a coherent, distinctive visual theme for the hospital website (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and apply it consistently across sections; avoid a blue/purple color scheme unless explicitly requested by the user later.

Add basic on-page SEO and accessibility essentials for the hospital landing page: meaningful page title, meta description, semantic headings (single H1), accessible link/button labels, and sufficient color contrast for text.
Add a simple Contact section layout that displays the provided address and includes a clearly formatted “How to reach” area (text-only; no maps/geolocation integrations).

Replace both existing contact phone numbers (currently shown as “08514-247365” and “+91 9618158499”) across the landing page with the new numbers “08514 220234” and “7207534210”, including updating all corresponding tel: links.

Scan the entire frontend codebase and static HTML for any remaining occurrences of the old phone numbers (e.g., “08514-247365”, “08514 247365”, “+91 9618158499”, “9618158499”) and replace them everywhere with the correct KVR Hospital numbers: “08514 220234” and “7207534210”, including updating any corresponding tel: links.

Refactor the frontend to define the hospital contact details (phone numbers, tel: links, email, address) in a single shared constant/module and update LandingPage, ContactSection, and Footer to consume these shared values to prevent future inconsistencies.

new_feature_requests.summary: Edit the existing website for KVR Hospital (Nandyal).
Update website contact phone numbers: replace both existing numbers with 08514 220234 and 7207534210.
